author: Ronan McGreevy
title: Genetics shed light on origins of Irish strains of Covid-19
description: Strains identified in Dublin, Cork and Limerick linked to Birmingham, Boston and Copenhagen
content:
Since the Covid-19 virus strain was first identified in early 2020, scientists have been able to track its progress around the world. 
The virus is very slowly evolving, but in making copies of itself in its human hosts, it can introduce occasional errors in… [+4443 chars]
